00084 inline DFeatureVector::DFeatureVector(){
00085   DInstanceCounter::addInstance("DFeatureVector");
00086   pDbl = NULL;
00087   pFlt = NULL;
00088   fDataIsDouble = fDataCopied  = fDataGroupedByDim = false;
00089   dimensions = vectLen = 0;
00090 }
00092 inline DFeatureVector::DFeatureVector(const DFeatureVector &src){
00093   DInstanceCounter::addInstance("DFeatureVector");
00094   fDataIsDouble = src.fDataIsDouble;
00095   fDataGroupedByDim = src.fDataGroupedByDim;
00096   fDataCopied = true;
00097   dimensions = src.dimensions;
00098   vectLen = src.vectLen;
00099   if(src.pDbl != NULL){
00100     pDbl = (double*)malloc(sizeof(double)*dimensions*vectLen);
00101     D_CHECKPTR(pDbl);
00102     memcpy(pDbl, src.pDbl, sizeof(double)*dimensions*vectLen);
00103   }
00104   if(src.pFlt != NULL){
00105     pFlt = (float*)malloc(sizeof(float)*dimensions*vectLen);
00106     D_CHECKPTR(pFlt);
00107     memcpy(pFlt, src.pFlt, sizeof(float)*dimensions*vectLen);
00108   }
00109 }
00110 inline void DFeatureVector::clearData(){
00111   if(fDataCopied){
00112     if(NULL!=pDbl)
00113       free(pDbl);
00114     if(NULL!=pFlt)
00115       free(pFlt);
00116   }
00117   pFlt = NULL;
00118   pDbl = NULL;
00119 }
00120 inline DFeatureVector::~DFeatureVector(){
00121   DInstanceCounter::removeInstance("DFeatureVector");
00122   clearData();
00123   dimensions = vectLen = 0;
00124   fDataIsDouble = fDataGroupedByDim = fDataCopied = false;
00125 }
00127 inline const DFeatureVector& DFeatureVector::operator=(const DFeatureVector &src){
00128   if(this != &src){
00129     //first deallocate old data so we don't leak memory
00130     clearData();
00131     //now copy data from src
00132     fDataIsDouble = src.fDataIsDouble;
00133     fDataGroupedByDim = src.fDataGroupedByDim;
00134     fDataCopied = true;
00135     dimensions = src.dimensions;
00136     vectLen = src.vectLen;
00137     if(src.pDbl != NULL){
00138       pDbl = (double*)malloc(sizeof(double)*dimensions*vectLen);
00139       D_CHECKPTR(pDbl);
00140       memcpy(pDbl, src.pDbl, sizeof(double)*dimensions*vectLen);
00141     }
00142     if(src.pFlt != NULL){
00143       pFlt = (float*)malloc(sizeof(float)*dimensions*vectLen);
00144       D_CHECKPTR(pFlt);
00145       memcpy(pFlt, src.pFlt, sizeof(float)*dimensions*vectLen);
00146     }
00147   }
00148   return *this;
00149 }

00152 inline double DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDistSquared_nochecks(const DFeatureVector &fv1,const DFeatureVector &fv2){
00153   double dblSum = 0.;
00154   if(fv1.fDataIsDouble){
00155     for(int i = 0, len=fv1.vectLen; i < len; ++i){
00156       dblSum += (fv1.pDbl[i] - fv2.pDbl[i])*(fv1.pDbl[i] - fv2.pDbl[i]);
00157     }
00158   }
00159   else{
00160     for(int i = 0, len=fv1.vectLen; i < len; ++i){
00161       dblSum += (double)(fv1.pFlt[i] - fv2.pFlt[i])*(fv1.pFlt[i] - fv2.pFlt[i]);
00162     }
00163   }
00164   return dblSum;
00165 }
00166 
00168 inline double DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist_nochecks(const DFeatureVector
00169               &fv1,
00170               const DFeatureVector
00171               &fv2){
00172   return sqrt(DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDistSquared_nochecks(fv1,fv2));
00173 }
00175 
00176 inline double DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDistSquared(const DFeatureVector &fv1,
00177                   const DFeatureVector &fv2){
00178   if(fv1.vectLen != fv2.vectLen){
00179     fprintf(stderr, "DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist() vector lengths don't "
00180       "match! (%d!=%d)\n",fv1.vectLen, fv2.vectLen);
00181     return HUGE_VAL;
00182   }
00183   if((fv1.dimensions!=1)||(fv2.dimensions!= 1)){
00184     fprintf(stderr, "DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist() vector dimensions must "
00185       "both be 1! (dimensions are %d and %d)\n",
00186       fv1.dimensions, fv2.dimensions);
00187     return HUGE_VAL;
00188   }
00189   // if(fv1.fDataGroupedByDim != fv2.fDataGroupedByDim){
00190   //   fprintf(stderr, "DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist() vector data must "
00191   //      "be grouped/interleaved the same way for each vector\n");
00192   //   return HUGE_VAL;
00193   // }
00194   if(fv1.fDataIsDouble != fv2.fDataIsDouble){
00195     fprintf(stderr, "DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist() data types must "
00196       "match\n");
00197     return HUGE_VAL;
00198   }
00199   if(fv1.vectLen <=0){
00200     fprintf(stderr, "DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist() length must be > 0\n ");
00201     return HUGE_VAL;
00202   }
00203   return DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDistSquared_nochecks(fv1,fv2);
00204 }
00206 
00207 inline double DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDist(const DFeatureVector &fv1,
00208                  const DFeatureVector &fv2){
00209   return sqrt(DFeatureVector::getEuclideanDistSquared(fv1,fv2));
00210 }
